note.p: American physician and surgeon. A founder of the Northwestern Medical College, St Joseph, Missouri, 1881; professor of medical chemistry and toxicology, and lecturer on diseases of the chest.
U.S. Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 February 2017)
The history of Buchanan County, Missouri (St Joseph, Missouri: Union Historical Company, 1881), p. 619
